message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $95.
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but I still think $85 is a fair price for the product. Can you meet me at $85?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'll meet you at $90. It's the best I can do.
I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $87.50?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll meet you at $88. It's the lowest I can go.
I'm really close to my budget, but I think I can stretch it to $85. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $86, and that's my final offer.

I've really tried to negotiate, but I think I'm at my limit. I'll meet you at $85, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from another seller.
